original_title: Duminda Dissanayake appointed SLFP’s Acting General Secretary
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Freedom Party’s (SLFP) faction led by Minister Nimal Siripala de Silva has appointed MP Duminda Dissanayake as the party’s Acting General Secretary.
He was appointed during the politburo meeting convened by the faction backing Minister Nimal Siripala de Silva this evening (25).
